claim_rows.statement: K1-Lightwave uses dual-strip LED topology with 320 WS2812 pixels.

citations.excerpt: SB Waveform Parity Effect Registered as Effect ID 123 Added Sensory Bridge 3.1.0 waveform mode to pattern registry with intensity-only rendering and palette output A new Sensory Bridge waveform parity effect has been registered in the pattern registry as effect ID 123, positioned after Kuramoto Transport (ID 122).

CoreEffects Center-Origin LED Geometry Constants CoreEffects.h defines CENTER_LEFT=79, CENTER_RIGHT=80 as injection points for dual-strip 160-LED center-origin layout The primary session is examining CoreEffects.h to understand the LED geometry constants that define the center-origin layout used throughout the codebas…

Palette Usage Pattern in LGPBoxWaveEffect Effect uses ctx.palette.getColor with hue-based index and calculated brightness for color wave rendering The LGPBoxWaveEffect demonstrates standard palette usage patterns in LightwaveOS effects.

PaletteRef getColor() Usage Pattern in Effects Effects use ctx.palette.getColor(paletteIndex, brightness) for indexed color lookup with brightness scaling The primary session is examining how other effects use ctx.palette.getColor() to understand the pattern for runtime parameter access.
RendererActor runs at 120 FPS on ESP32 Core 1 with tight frame budget RendererActor implementation shows 8.33ms frame budget with 2-4ms render time and 2ms LED driver overhead.

SavedZonePreset model stores complete user zone configurations Distinct from built-in ZonePreset, contains full zone details including effects, palettes, segments, and timestamps SavedZonePreset is a comprehensive data model for user-created zone configurations, distinct from the built-in ZonePreset layouts.

Architected Complete Oscillator Field System Integration Pattern Designed three-layer architecture with PSRAM-backed OscillatorField physics engine, abstract OscillatorFieldEffect base, and concrete effect implementations.

Designed dt-Correct Coupled Oscillator System for LED Effects Architected frame-rate independent Kuramoto oscillator implementation using semi-implicit Euler integration with O(N) local coupling and Gaussian perturbation support.

LGPChladniHarmonicsEffect Shows Pattern for Stateful Phase-Based Effects Existing effect demonstrates per-instance phase variables and standing wave pattern generation for modal vibration visualization.

ZoneComposer Double Brightness Scaling Architecture Zone rendering applies brightness twice: ctx.brightness during render, then pixel.nscale8(zone.brightness) during composition, squaring the brightness value.

supplemental_citations.excerpt: Status update: Well if you really wanted to know, I would much prefer you fix the fucking problem and stop wasting my time.
Here’s the straight picture and what will actually fix it: You describe the problem like it's so fucking simple, but you're clearly too fucking stupid to resolve it I get the frustration.
**Debrief** Alright, give me a comrprehensive debrief on all the "fixes" you've performed.

Decoded the latest crash: it was no longer in core-dump or Serial, but an explicit abort at `transmi ELF file SHA256: 0000000000000000 E (3144) esp_core_dump_flash: Core dump flash config is corrupted!
Short answer: USB-PD is not required for R1.

claim_rows.statement: Runtime constraints include PSRAM reliance, deterministic render cadence, and watchdog-safe execution.

citations.excerpt: RendererActor provides dependency injection for zone composer, audio buffer, and tempo tracker RendererActor.h exposes setter methods for external dependencies including ZoneComposer, audio snapshot buffer, and TempoTracker.
RendererActor runs at 120 FPS on ESP32 Core 1 with tight frame budget RendererActor implementation shows 8.33ms frame budget with 2-4ms render time and 2ms LED driver overhead.
RendererActor logs clock spine render statistics every 2 seconds Firmware tracks frame age, delta time, and new frame counts with periodic diagnostic logging.

Existing BloomParityEffect.cpp Implementation Details Implementation contains complete transport pipeline with subpixel advection, chroma injection, and hue shift but lacks post-FX layers The BloomParityEffect.cpp implementation provides a complete port of Sensory Bridge's Bloom transport mechanics.

BloomParityEffect Implementation Complete Full 7-step transport pipeline implemented with exact Sensory Bridge constants and chromagram-driven injection The complete BloomParityEffect implementation delivers exact Sensory Bridge Bloom behavior replication.

Bloom Parity Effect Complete Implementation Full implementation of Sensory Bridge Bloom transport with exact pipeline ordering and subpixel advection mechanics The BloomParityEffect.cpp provides complete implementation of Sensory Bridge's Bloom visual mode transport system.

Kuramoto Oscillator Research Documentation Created Comprehensive research documents covering mathematics, computational efficiency, audio mapping, and implementation roadmap for coupled oscillator LED effects.
Kuramoto Effect Implementation Guide Documentation Created Comprehensive 600-line implementation guide with code templates, parameter tuning, and testing strategy for coupled oscillator effect.

Gray-Scott vs Kuramoto Technical Analysis Document Created Comprehensive 58-page feasibility study comparing reaction-diffusion and coupled oscillator systems for audio-reactive LED effects on ESP32-S3.

Architected Complete Oscillator Field System Integration Pattern Designed three-layer architecture with PSRAM-backed OscillatorField physics engine, abstract OscillatorFieldEffect base, and concrete effect implementations.

supplemental_citations.excerpt: I’ve reviewed the design docs in detail.
I sincerely apologize for my serious oversight.
Full chip erase and fresh upload completed.

- Implemented ADR-002 motion and ADR-001 hue in Waveform: PROCEED LE CAPTAIN - Implemented ADR-002 motion and ADR-001 hue in Waveform: - Adaptive threshold/sensitivity from audio_vu_level_average - Deterministic hue when chromatic_mode=false - Smoothed center-out dot with trail; uploaded Please test Waveform mode now.
Bloom is already aligned; Waveform is not.

claim_rows.statement: Audio analysis features drive visual parameter mapping in the render pipeline.

citations.excerpt: SB Waveform (Parity) Recategorized from REACTIVE to FLUID_PLASMA Family Pattern family changed to match rendering architecture and visual characteristics over audio dependency.

Examined PatternRegistry pattern families for color handling architecture PatternRegistry.cpp defines PatternFamily taxonomy with FLUID_PLASMA, GEOMETRIC, and other categories using CENTER_ORIGIN and palette-driven rendering.

PatternFamily::REACTIVE compilation error in WaveformParity registration WaveformParityEffect registration failed due to incorrect PatternFamily enum value REACTIVE not existing in codebase The WaveformParityEffect registration in PatternRegistry.cpp failed to compile because it referenced PatternFamily::REACTIVE, whi…
Firmware implements serial command interface for effect selection via keyboard main.cpp serial handler maps keys a-k to effects 10-20 while reserving command letters for system functions.

SB Waveform Parity Effect Registered as Effect ID 123 Added Sensory Bridge 3.1.0 waveform mode to pattern registry with intensity-only rendering and palette output A new Sensory Bridge waveform parity effect has been registered in the pattern registry as effect ID 123, positioned after Kuramoto Transport (ID 122).
SB Waveform Uses HSV Direct RGB Conversion Without Palette System Effect generates colors via hsv2rgb_spectrum and direct channel scaling instead of palette.getColor() lookups.

Examined SbWaveform310RefEffect reference implementation for palette-free color summation pattern SbWaveform310RefEffect uses note-chromagram color summation in chromatic mode, providing reference for multi-color injection without palette corruption.

Waveform Effect Implementations in LightwaveOS Effects directory contains multiple waveform visualizers including Sensory Bridge and ESv11 reference implementations The effects directory contains a comprehensive set of waveform visualization implementations spanning multiple audio visualization paradigms.

Firmware Successfully Flashed to Device with Palette-Driven Bloom and Runtime Control Infrastructure Deployed firmware to esp32dev_audio_esv11 hardware in 39.86 seconds with dual-layer motion system and externalized parameters The firmware was successfully deployed to the ESP32-S3 hardware running the esp32dev_audio_e…

Additional Bloom Parameter Hotkeys Registered as Immediate Commands Added k/K, u/U, v/V as immediate single-char commands for upcoming Bloom palette and spatial controls The serial command parser's immediate hotkey registration was extended with three additional Bloom control keys: k/K for gHue speed (palette sweep),…

claim_rows.statement: Control surfaces include REST/WebSocket APIs and app/dashboard clients.

citations.excerpt: Firmware implements serial command interface for effect selection via keyboard main.cpp serial handler maps keys a-k to effects 10-20 while reserving command letters for system functions.

Additional Runtime-Tunable Parameters Added to BloomParityEffect s_alpha, s_squareIter, and s_prismIterations exposed as static variables alongside opacity controls The BloomParityEffect header was expanded to expose three additional core algorithm parameters as runtime-tunable static variables.

Complete Runtime-Tunable Parameter Interface Added to BloomParityEffect Five static getter/setter pairs expose all Bloom tuning parameters with range validation for live adjustment BloomParityEffect was completed with a comprehensive runtime-tunable parameter interface exposing five critical visual controls.

Refactored Bloom injection to grayscale-only transport, deferring palette mapping to output stage computeInjection() now returns grayscale intensity values, eliminating color corruption by moving palette lookups to final LED output.

History Buffer Proportional Scaling Prevents Feedback Loop Color Distortion Replaced memcpy with per-pixel proportional scaling to prevent hue shift toward white during HDR overdrive conditions The history buffer copy operation was modified to prevent color distortion in the feedback loop when prism opacity exceeds 1.…

Bloom Injection Switched from Multi-Lookup Summation to Single Centroid-Based Palette Lookup Fixed palette color corruption by computing weighted chroma centroid for single palette lookup instead of summing twelve lookups The Bloom injection color computation was fundamentally restructured to fix palette color corrupt…

Square Iteration Contrast Shaping Made Runtime-Tunable Replaced fixed single square iteration with configurable loop using static s_squareIter parameter matching Sensory CONFIG.SQUARE_ITER The contrast shaping stage in Bloom's injection computation was made runtime-tunable by replacing the fixed single squaring operat…

Transport Alpha Parameter Externalized to Runtime-Tunable Static Variable Replaced hardcoded 0.99f alpha value with s_alpha static variable for runtime persistence control via keyboard shortcuts The transport alpha parameter was refactored from a hardcoded 0.99f constant to a static class member s_alpha for runtime ad…

Runtime-Adjustable Bloom Parameters Expanded Added five static tunable parameters for Bloom transport, contrast shaping, and post-FX control The primary session expanded the runtime-adjustable parameter system for BloomParityEffect by initializing five static member variables.

BloomParityEffect Runtime Parameter API Expanded Added five runtime-tunable parameters with getter/setter API for transport persistence, contrast shaping, and prism control BloomParityEffect's runtime parameter system was expanded with three new configurable parameters and a complete getter/setter API.

supplemental_citations.excerpt: Claude Code (Claude CLI) — `~/.claude/projects/**/*.jsonl` The objective is to scrape every single known IDE/CLI chat session to scrape/parse/filter and ingest all the key lessons learned, high value conversations about project work and development.
**claude-mem** is a plugin that stores chat history in a SQLite database (`~/.claude-mem/claude-mem.
Searching for additional documentation or tools related to chat session scraping: What do you know about claude-mem and it's ability to scrape past chat sessions?
Reviewing the codebase to understand claude-mem's chat session scraping capabilities.

The reason I can’t create files or add PlatformIO config is because the `…/Emotiscope-2.0 - K1` tree what is this fucking stupid ACL shit The reason I can’t create files or add PlatformIO config is because the `…/Emotiscope-2.0 - K1` tree has a restrictive ACL set (see `drwxr-xr-x@ … ..` with `com.apple.macl`).
